ComicInfo.Writer: Francis Takenaga,Tom Harrington,Whilce Portacio,Tom Harrington,Whilce Portacio,Francis Takenaga
ComicInfo.Title: The Lone One
ComicInfo.Summary:
A scuffle between vampires and a werewolf awakens a frozen Frankenstein.
Wetworks investigates the site of a recent vampire battle. Pilgrim heads in first for recon and meets another version of herself who battles her before pulling her through a portal into the future. The vampires crown Drakken as their new king.
